experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain scalable RESTful APIs using Java Spring Boot for high-traffic enterprise applications.
Optimize PostgreSQL database queries and indexing strategies, resulting in a 15% reduction in application latency.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to transition monolithic services into a containerized microservices architecture using Docker.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Assisted in the development of an internal system diagnostic tool written in C++ for monitoring hardware performance.

Participated in daily agile stand-ups and performed code reviews for fellow engineering interns.
